titles.title: Honoring Chief Charles Moose of the Montgomery County, Maryland, Police Department, and the local and Federal law enforcement officers who worked tirelessly to bring an end to the sniper shootings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Introduced. Recognizes the outstanding work of local and Federal law enforcement officers who worked to bring an end to the October sniper shootings in the Washington, D.C. area. Acknowledges the exceptional leadership and commitment to duty demonstrated by Chief Charles Moose of the Montgomery County, Maryland, Police Department, who led the investigation. Expresses condolences to the families of those killed or injured during the shootings.
